original_text: And the poles were so long that the ends of the poles were seen from the Holy Place before the inner sanctuary, but they could not be seen from outside. And they are there to this day.
korean_text: 그 채가 길어서 궤에서 나오므로 그 끝이 본전 앞에서 보이나 밖에서는 보이지 아니하며 그 궤가 오늘까지 그 곳에 있으며

sentences.original_text: And the poles were so long
that the ends of the poles were seen
from the Holy Place before the inner sanctuary
but they could not be seen from outside
And they are there to this day
